name: Habano Reserve Robusto
additionalNotes:
To create this special blend, the robust flavors and aromas of hearty, oily, dark brown Habano 2000 wrapper leaves from the corona (very top-most portion of the tobacco plant) have been married with well-fermented Dominican and Nicaraguan ligero long fillers.

http://www.niceashcigars.com/ProductSearch.aspx?SNAME=Domeza%20Habano%20Reserve&STYPE=1
